name: VersionVSIX
description: Applies a version to a VSIX manifest based on the build number. Based on Microsoft sample from https://msdn.microsoft.com/Library/vs/alm/Build/overview
author: Black Marble

inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: Source folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source folder for VSIX files, can be root as it will find all files recursively

inputs.name: VersionNumberOnly
inputs.label: Version number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version number to apply to files. You need either to set the version number or build name.

inputs.name: VersionNumber
inputs.label: Build name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build name (in 'Build HelloWorld_00.00.00000.0' format) from which the version should be extracted. You need either to set the version number or build name.
